name: Fly to the R̶e̶s̶c̶u̶e Death
description:
You are a fly that tries to destroy humanity with the help of the Congo Smarthome.

How to Play

You can either use the arrow keys, WASD, the D-Pad or the Left Stick to move. You can activate its features using the keys 8, 9, 0 or the face buttons.

The Team & Credits

Game & Art by: The_Legend_of_xD (itch.io)

Music by: Joshua M. (J の 7) (itch.io, Youtube)
